channel.title: IDE on Abdullah
channel.description: Recent content in IDE on Abdullah

item.title: How to use vIM as IDE in Debian, Ubuntu, Mint
item.description: Been using source based distributions for a long time. Source based distributions are cool for systems with limited resources. But what if you don’t have enough time? Debian is one of the oldest distribution there which is known for stability. Stability? Well that never had been a priority for me but for some reasons I came to it and now using it for some months. It’s a cool distribution. Well, that enough said, let’s come to the topic.
